none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2023-02-media-blitz/extracted/Media Blitz - TV/03 I'm Pissed And Mad

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on February 22, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Snotty and feisty punk that oozes Southern California '90s. This is every band that played a suburban strip mall skate shop, every band that played backyard keggers in Ontario, the local band who played first on a six band package bill, the band who opened for MDC in a random locals bar in Temecula, the band who had one EP on Beer City. If these things make sense to you then you will identify with these sounds immediately...and sometimes I really like listening to a time warp. T.V. VIOLENCE
